original_title: UFC Fight Night 45: Cerrone vs. Miller
overview: UFC Fight Night 45: Cerrone vs. Miller was a mixed martial arts event held on July 16, 2014 at Revel Casino Hotel in Atlantic City, New Jersey. The event was headlined by a lightweight bout between Donald Cerrone and Jim Miller. The preliminary card bout between Cláudia Gadelha and Tina Lähdemäki was the first women's strawweight fight in UFC history.
title: UFC Fight Night 45: Cerrone vs. Miller
